content: this text is a legal document explaining the progress of a divorce case between mr pe and mrs ha the parties have agreed to proceed with a divorce by mutual consent and have made various agreements regarding the division of assets settlement of debts and treatment of future assets and liabilities they have also renounced certain inheritance rights and agreed to retain inter vivos gifts granted during their marriage the document states that the divorce will become final once certain conditions are fulfilled and that the costs will be borne by the parties the parties have also made arrangements for the custody and residence of their minor children and have agreed not to pay maintenance to each other the costs and fees related to the divorce will be split equally between the parties the agreements made between the parties will come into effect once the divorce decree is finalized and will be binding on third parties the document also mentions the obligations of the notary involved and the parties acknowledgement of the contents of the document
